column1: "Info": "The Toyota Corolla is a compact car that has been in production since 1966
column2: making it one of the longest-running nameplates in automotive history. It is known for its reliability
column5: and has become one of the best-selling cars in the world. "

column1: "Info": "The Toyota Camry is a mid-size sedan that is known for its reliability
column3: and fuel efficiency. It has a sleek and modern exterior design
column4: with a comfortable and well-appointed interior that includes advanced technology features. "

column1: "Info": "The Toyota RAV4 is a compact crossover SUV known for its practicality
column3: and versatility. It has been a popular choice for families
column5: and outdoor enthusiasts since its debut in 1994. The RAV4 offers a comfortable ride
column7: and available all-wheel drive for improved traction in slippery conditions."

column1: "Info": "The Toyota Highlander is a midsize SUV known for its reliability
column3: and comfort. It can seat up to eight people
column4: and offers a spacious interior with plenty of storage and cargo space. The Highlander is equipped with a range of safety features

column1: "Info": "The Toyota Tacoma is a mid-size pickup truck known for its reliability
column3: and off-road capabilities. It has a spacious cabin and bed
column4: and comes in multiple configurations including two or four-wheel drive

column1: "Info": "The Toyota Tundra is a full-size pickup truck that is known for its rugged reliability and impressive towing capacity. It is available in multiple trims and configurations
column2: ranging from a basic work truck to a fully loaded luxury model. The Tundra features a spacious and comfortable interior
column4: and powerful engine options. It is built to withstand tough terrain and harsh weather conditions
column5: making it a popular choice for outdoor enthusiasts and work crews alike."
